title: Create Pod with InitContainer
description: Create a Pod named ||init-pod|| with an init container that runs ||busybox:1.31.0|| with command ||'echo Init complete'|| and a main container running ||nginx:1.20-alpine|| in the ||mars|| namespace.

validations.command: kubectl get pod init-pod -n mars -o jsonpath='{.status.phase}'
kubectl get pod init-pod -n mars -o jsonpath='{.spec.initContainers[0].name}'
validations.description: Pod should have init container named init-container
Init container should use busybox:1.31.0 image

validations.command: kubectl get pod init-pod -n mars -o jsonpath='{.spec.containers[0].image}'
validations.description: Main container should use nginx:1.20-alpine image
